title: Pat McFadden – 2022 Comments on Rising Energy Bills
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Pat McFadden, the Shadow Chief Secretary to the Treasury, on 6 January 2022.
content:
The Government’s incompetence and failure has contributed to this crisis – destroying UK gas storage, regulation failures which customers will now have to pay for and more.
